name: ULTIMATE SMASHBOX
description:
ULTIMATE SMASHBOX is a project originally developed on the M.U.G.E.N engine and currently developed in the I.K.E.M.E.N engine. Its objective is to bring together the most recognized characters around the world to provide a Crossover Fighting Game experience, from a new perspective with an unique story (Still in development, but you can test a Beta Version).

                                                            Features of Full Version                                                                      

● ARCADE MODE (WITH 2 ROUTES - STILL IN DEVELOPMENT)

● FREE CPU VERSUS MODE

● TRAINING MODE

● CPU VS CPU MODE

● ENDLESS MODE

● CHALLENGES (MISSIONS, SURVIVAL, BOSS RUSH, TIME ATTACK, SUDDEN DEATH, INSANE MODE)

● EVENTS AVAILABLE EXCLUSIVELY AT CERTAIN HOURS

● LOCAL AND ONLINE MULTIPLAYER MODE

● ONLINE REPLAYS PLAYER

● SPECIAL FEATURES (STORYBOARDS, SOUND TEST, ART GALLERY, STAGE VIEWER)

● PROGRESS METER (STILL IN DEVELOPMENT)

● UNLOCKS AND CHEATS AVAILABLES

● 3 GAME SYSTEMS (SINGLE | TAG TEAM | TURNS)

● MORE THAN 100 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS

● MORE THAN 30 PLAYABLE SECRET CHARACTERS

● MORE THAN 50 BOSSES

● MORE THAN 10 BONUS GAMES

● MORE THAN 100 STAGES

● MORE THAN 100 SONGS

● DLC CONTENT AVAILABLE TO MERGED WITH UNLIMITED EDITION AND CAN BE LOADED IN GAME OPTIONS

● ACCESS TO THE LITE EDITION VIA GAME OPTIONS, WITH A RETROCOMPATIBLE ROSTER, TO PLAY ONLINE WITH THOSE WHO HAVE THE DEMO VERSION

Requirements Mínimums                                                                      

➤ Windows XP SP3 - 32 Bits

➤ 1.66GHz - Intel(R) Atom(TM) CPU N455

➤ 2GB RAM

➤ 256MB VRAM

➤ DirectX 11 (OpenGL is not need)

➤ 12GB HDD
